angles.name: community_support
angles.description: Emphasizes belonging, peer help, shared learning
angles.primaryFocus: The community aspect and peer support
angles.valueProposition: You're not doing this alone—join others on the same path
angles.applicationGuidance: Lead with community benefits, mention member count if impressive, highlight interaction opportunities, emphasize shared journey

angles.name: expert_insight
angles.description: Focuses on creator credentials and expertise
angles.primaryFocus: The expertise and track record of the creator
angles.valueProposition: Learn from someone who's been there and done it
angles.applicationGuidance: Mention creator background early, reference methodology, position as authoritative source

angles.name: onboarding_simplicity
angles.description: Highlights how easy it is to get started
angles.primaryFocus: Low barrier to entry, simple setup
angles.valueProposition: Get started quickly without technical hurdles
angles.applicationGuidance: Emphasize simplicity, mention quick setup time, reassure about ease of use

angles.name: transparency_safety
angles.primaryFocus: No hidden catches, honest about what you get
keyPhrases: what you see is what you get
angles.valueProposition: Know exactly what you're getting before you commit
avoidWhen: already-skeptical audience might see it as defensive
angles.applicationGuidance: Be explicit about terms, mention cancellation policy, address common concerns proactively

angles.name: affordability
angles.description: Focuses on value for money and savings
angles.valueProposition: Get premium value without the premium price tag
angles.applicationGuidance: Highlight savings, compare to alternatives, emphasize what's included for the price

angles.name: access_flexibility
angles.description: Emphasizes multiple options and user choice
angles.primaryFocus: Options to fit different needs and budgets
angles.valueProposition: Find the option that matches your specific needs
angles.applicationGuidance: Present options clearly, help user self-select, mention upgrade paths

angles.name: educational_focus
angles.valueProposition: Develop skills that last beyond the subscription
angles.applicationGuidance: Focus on what user will learn, mention curriculum structure, highlight lasting value

angles.name: performance_speed
angles.valueProposition: Get where you want to go faster
angles.applicationGuidance: Quantify time savings if possible, emphasize efficiency, mention quick wins

angles.name: personalization
angles.description: Focuses on tailored experience and individual fit
angles.applicationGuidance: Mention customization options, acknowledge different user needs, emphasize adaptability

angles.name: risk_management
angles.description: Emphasizes protecting capital and smart decisions
angles.valueProposition: Make informed decisions and avoid costly mistakes
angles.applicationGuidance: Address risk openly, mention protective strategies, emphasize informed decision-making

angles.name: outcome_results
angles.description: Focuses on what users will achieve
angles.valueProposition: Focus on what you'll actually accomplish
angles.applicationGuidance: Be specific about potential outcomes, include qualifiers, focus on user's end goals

angles.name: member_autonomy
angles.valueProposition: Tools and knowledge to make your own informed decisions
angles.applicationGuidance: Emphasize user agency, position as enabler not director, respect user's decision-making
